resources.string: Make sure you can see the right eye clearly in the circle below
Instructions:\nAfter you press start, dots will appear on the screen. Hit the RED dots as quickly as you can!
To start the Baseline test, hand the phone to the player.
Instructions:\nAfter you press start, words will begin to appear on the screen. Do your best to remember as many words as possible.
Instructions:\nSelect all words you remember from the list you just saw. Once you have selected all of the words you remember, hit submit.
Instructions:\nAfter you press start, pairs of words will begin to appear on the screen. Do your best to remember each pair of words.
Instructions:\nSelect the word that was paired with the following word. When you are sure of your answer, hit submit.
On a scale of 0-10, 0 meaning not at all, 10 meaning the worst you can imagine, how much are the following symptoms bothering you?\n
Instructions:\nRemember each of the four images on this screen\n
Instructions:\nWhich of the following images was on the previous screen? Make sure to pick the image with the same orientation as in the previous screen.
Based on your responses to the symptom survey, it is likely that the player has a concussion.
Based on your responses to the symptom survey, no concussion has been detected. Click continue to move to the next part of the assessment.
The player is likely to have a concussion. Please seek medical attention right away.
Based on the pupil images, no concussion has been detected. Click continue to move to the next part of the assessment.
"Based on the results of the tests, it is likely that the player is concussed."
Based on the results of the tests, no concussion has been detected. Concussion symptoms may not appear for 48 hours. Therefore, continue to monitor the player for symptoms for the next 48 hours.
Click on the "call PCP" button to dial the PCP emergency number. A medical professional is needed to determine if the player needs further evaluation and treatment.
In the next page, you will be taking images of the player eyes. Place the phone close to player nose and make sure player eye is seen in the preview circle below. Then click continue

In the bext page, you will be measuring sizes of pupils. You can zoom-in using double tap to view pupils of your preferred size. Next click on measure pupil. Use the cropping tool to match the size of pupil on screen. Submit the image and move to the next image.
Put any side (including the back) of your Android device on a flat horizontal surface and press the Calibrate button.\n\nOr reset the calibration for all the phone sides.
The sensor change requires re-calibration of the phone.
Less smooth animations\nbut preserves the battery life
Inches of rise per foot of run\n3 ~ 14°
